name: The Supernal Overflow
text: A sudden surge from the Kether. Once per Sphere, after the reveal, this player may manifest one additional card from their Hand to the emanation.

name: The Breath of Dissolution
text: The authority to unmake. Once per Sphere, after the reveal, this player may choose one manifested card and reduce its vibration (value) to 0 for that Pulse.

name: The Leadened Shackle
text: Influence of Saturn. The soul is heavy with material history. Your Awareness (Hand Capacity) is reduced by 1.

name: The Veiled Eye
text: The Veil of Maya. You must play your card face-down before the Law of the Sphere (Terrain) is revealed.

name: The Fractured Pillar
text: Instability in Yesod. If the group Stalls (Undershoots), this resolves after draw/refill effects: you first apply any refill (including Resonance), then discard 1 additional card from your Hand.

name: The Sulfuric Will
text: Hyper-fixation on the Physical. Your cards always count as +2 value.

name: The Akashic Lens
text: Prophetic Sight. All players can inspect the 5 Laws (Terrain cards) of the current Sphere at any time.

name: The Mercurial Joints
text: Adaptability of the Sage. Your 0 count as nerfed Jolly cards (0-3).

name: The Sophic Vent
text: Wisdom of the Higher Spheres. When you play a Steam (White) card, reduce Friction by 1.

name: The Unveiled Radiance
text: Absolute clarity. You may manifest your card face-up during the Selection Phase.

name: The Communion of Vessels
text: The flow of essence. After the Sphereâ€™s Law is revealed, you must exchange one card from your hand with another player. You choose the recipient; they receive your card and then return a card of their choosing.

name: The Harmonized Memory
text: Resonance with the Akasha. You may perform an Akashic Swap for 0 Friction if the suit of your manifested card matches the suit of the card taken from the Reservoir.

name: The Reinforced Hull
text: The first Overshoot damage to the Vessel each Sphere is prevented. The pulse still resolves and all players reset their hands as normal.

name: The Scales of Geburah
text: Judgment and Justice. Passive: Your manifested cards always count as +3 value. If the group Overshoots (Pride) and your manifested value is tied for the highest, the Golem takes 2 Damage instead of 1.

name: The Lens of Tiphareth
text: The light of beauty. Active (Actions phase): swap your manifested card with one card from your Hand. If used, you skip the next Pulse (you cannot manifest a card in that Pulse).

name: The Anchor of Malkuth
text: Grounding in matter. Passive (first trigger only): the first time in a Chapter the group Stalls by 3 or less below the Window Min, treat that Pulse as Success. From that trigger onward (including the triggering pulse), you cannot refill through Success or Resonance for the rest of the Chapter. Overshoot and Desperation refills still apply.

name: The Vessel of Dualities
text: The balance of opposites. Passive: If the total sum is exactly the median of the Stability Window (rounded down), reduce Friction to 0. If the sum is exactly the Window's Max or Min, the Golem immediately generates +1 Friction.
